long_description: The ruggedly built Osprey Porter 65 distills the essence of a travel pack into its lightest, cleanest form. It's ideal for travelers who want to keep it simple. Comfortable shoulder straps and a fabric waistbelt quickly tuck away into the padded back panel when they aren't needed. Padded sidewalls and StraightJacket(TM) compression combine to keep the contents protected, and ensure the pack carries comfortably whether half full or maxed out. Zip-away shoulder harness with adjustable sternum strap and rescue whistle buckle. Tuck-away fabric waistbelt with 1.5 in. webbing. Foam padded sidewalls create structure and protect contents. Padded top and side handles provide comfortable carry. Low-profile lower grab handles speed retrieval from baggage carousel. Large panel offers easy zip access to main compartment; internal zip pocket on front panel. Lockable sliders on main zipper. Zippered top pocket provides quick access to toiletries and liquids. Porter 65 has Add-On(TM) D-ring attachments; Osprey recommends a DayLite add-on-ready detachable daypack (available separately).
short_description: The ruggedly built Osprey Porter 65 distills the essence of a travel pack into its lightest, cleanest form. It's ideal for travelers who want to keep it simple.
